markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hadrosaurid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2918)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hadrosaurids are a broad grouping of herbivorous dinosaurs that share characteristic flat snouts filled with rows of grinding teeth well suited for feeding on vegetation. Also known as “duck-billed dinosaurs” due to the unusual shape of their jaws, hadrosaurids are lumbering creatures that can rival an elephant in size, although they tend to be much less aggressive and are prone to flight when confronted with danger. Many species of hadrosaurids have uniquely shaped crests on their heads, making them easily recognizable even to amateur dinosaur watchers.

 Giants and other oversized creatures have been known to domesticate hadrosaurids to serve as livestock. Despite their ability to sprint quickly, they don't make particularly viable mounts due to their timid natures, but a panicked herd of hadrosaurids can wreak great damage.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Hadrosaurid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2918)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=576" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 98 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +13; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 60

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +14 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +12 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d4+8 bludgeoning

**Sprint** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** The hadrosaurid Strides twice. It has a +20-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=81)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Large or smaller, foot, DC 21

</column>

name: Hadrosaurid
